body.text: Hi {{receiver.contact_name}} - Unfortunately, your customers application has been cancelled.

rows.text: {{sender.contact_name}} asked either the lender or Kanda to cancel their finance application. They can still apply again if this was a mistake. To apply again you'll need to send them a new quote from your dashboard.

rows.subtext: If something isn't right let us know by emailing help@kanda.co.uk.
